summary: SummaryCETAPHIL Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser, a creamy foaming cleanser that lathers into a rich foam, ideal for dry to normal skin. This gentle yet powerful foam face wash hydrates while cleansing without drying the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to remove dirt, makeup, excess oils and impuritiesFor normal to dry, sensitive skinHydrates and soothes as it cleanses, preserving the skin's moisture barrier and maintaining its natural pHDEFENDS AGAINST 5 SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrierDERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED for Sensitive SkinKey IngredientsGlycerin hydrates and moisturizes the skin, improving the skin barrier, and promoting overall skin healthPanthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrierNiacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin's texture and retain skin's moisture barrierAloe vera provides natural hydration and soothing effects for your skinFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensHypoallergenicWon't clog poresItem 2605917How To UseMassage a small amount onto wet skin. Rinse.IngredientsWater, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Arginine, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Pantolactone, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto wet skin. Rinse.

reviews.headline: Love this foaming cleanser
reviews.comments: My face feels so clean after using this product. I have used Cetaphil products for years and they have really help control breakouts on my face. This Foaming Cleanser is my new found favorite.

reviews.headline: Consistent Repurchase
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser. Doesn't dry you out. Great value for price.

reviews.headline: Accidentally purchased the foaming kind
reviews.comments: â€¦and it was too drying for me, as most foaming cleansers are, but i didnt return it since its Cetaphil and jr said it was hydrating. It does leave my skin feeling a little tight, so I don't like this as a dailt cleanser. I'd use it for days I wear makeup or have excess oil, etc.

reviews.headline: This is a repeat purchase I love
reviews.comments: I use to use a facial cleansing bar.  My skin is already drying with age. After using skin cleansing bar, still felt somewhat dry.  Cetaphil hydrating was recommended to me and I will continue with this product.  My skin is cleansed and still feels soft after a gentle wash with Cetaphil.  This product is a staple now in my skin cleaning routine.

reviews.headline: Wasn't for me
reviews.comments: I normally use the Peach slices snail rescue but I decided to try something different because the Cetaphil was on sale at the time. I'm definitely not bashing Cetaphil because it works for my husband just fine and I see the other reviews where people love it but for me personally it broke me out really bad. I have clear (combination) skin other than the occasional breakout due to hormones and black heads due to big pores but breaking out as bad as I did using Cetaphil threw me off. My chin dried out pretty bad to the point my moisturizer (Peach slices) didn't help, my cheeks and forehead were really oily as well. It got to the point where a new zit was popping up everyday, not only on my face but my neck as well which is unusual for me. I only used Cetaphil for a couple of weeks before I threw in the towel and went back to get my usual Peach slices snail rescue face wash and the toner to try and get my face under control. After using my usual stuff for my usual routine, including pimple patches, after a day my face is back to normal. That old saying "if it ain't broke, dont fix it" applies here and i'll be sticking to my usual routine.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser after oil cleansing at night and by itself in the morning. Residue free but doesnt dry out my skin and its really gentle around the eyes. I also used the Cerave one but did not like it much, This one is better.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser after oil cleansing at night and by itself in the morning. Residue free but doesnt dry out my skin and its really gentle around the eyes. I also used the Cerave one but did not like it much, This one is better.

reviews.headline: Cleans well, hydrating...
reviews.comments: The label reads "hydrating foaming cream cleanser," so I thought there would be foam.  If there is foam, it is almost none.  But the cleanser works well and doesn't dry out my skin.

reviews.headline: Do not waste money!
reviews.comments: It doesnt even foam. My skin does not even feel clean after using.

reviews.headline: cetaphil foreva
reviews.comments: love all cetaphil products especially for dry sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: I would by this product again.
reviews.comments:
Leaves my face very clean but not dry.
I like the foaming action. 
Rinses easily.

reviews.headline: Found the one!
reviews.comments: I love Cetaphil products! For the longest I've used their daily cleanser. I tried the Cerave version of this one because of all the tiktok hype however that broke me out!This one worked for my sensitive skin! Recommend!!

reviews.headline: Yep, this is now my staple
reviews.comments:
My skin type: combo, eczema prone, mild rosacea, also prone to infection. 

I have wildly sensitive, irritated, always painful skin. I have big whiteheads and blackheads that are on top of seriously dry sections, excess oil production, and also gets infected easily. Protecting my skin barrier is necessary, but most gentle cleansers (looking at you, cerave) do nothing to cleanse my skin. This is amazing. It is a light foam, no fragrance, and leaves my skin clean without tightness. Face wasn't red after washing and I can tell this is exactly what I've been searching for. I actually bought this at another store, but it's so good I'm posting the review here too for anyone on the fence lol.

faceoff_positive.comments: This facial cleanser does not foam in the typical sense, but it does provide a rich feel while on the skin. Once rinsed off of the complexion one's skin feels squeaky clean, yet not stripped. This product removes sunscreen and makeup easily. 1 to 2 pumps is all that it takes for a clean, fresh and soft feeling complexion. This product does not stink or smell like vomit, a previous review has claimed. This product is "fragrance free", thus what you smell is the formula in its natural state. Fragrance causes irritation and allergic reactions. I love this product and highly recommend it!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fresh, Clean & Non-stripping!

faceoff_negative.headline: Wasn't for me
